name: Aliens vs Rng
description:
Ludum Dare 38: A Small World

This was my second time entering the LD compo, and this is my entry this time around, I drew inspiration from "cards against humanity" and tried to lean towards that sort of dark humor.

With the time constraint I wasn't able to add as much content as I'd of liked to cram in so please forgive the lack of options
available at the moment.

Total number of cards: 8

Post Jam Changes

Version 0.1
- Added the Ambassador (Game Mechanics speech)
- Animated Stars
- Added World War Card
- fixed repeating dialog bug
- Increased text size

Version 0.2
- Added Trade ships (Click for a boost to a resource)
- Added New Cards
